content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Tribal TotemThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Tribal Totem
 This quest has a quick guide found here.
It briefly summarises the steps needed to complete the quest.
This article is about the quest. For the quest item, see Totem.
Tribal Totem (#25)
Released 30 April 2002 (Update)
Members Yes
Quest series None
Official difficulty Intermediate
Lead developer(s) Paul Gower

Tribal Totem is a quest that involves the retrieval of an artefact sacred to the Rantuki tribe of Karamja, which has been taken from them by the nobleman Lord Handelmort.

Contents

  • 1 Details
  • 2 Walkthrough
  • 3 Rewards
  • 4 Transcript
  • 5 Trivia

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Speak to Kangai Mau in Brimhaven.
Official difficultyIntermediate
DescriptionLord Handelmort of Ardougne is a collector of exotic artefacts. A recent addition to his private collection is a strange looking totem from Karamja. The Rantuki tribe are not happy about the recent disappearance of their totem.
Official lengthVery Short
Requirements
  • 21 Thieving (boostable)
Items required None
Recommended
  • Fast travel to Ardougne (Ardougne teleport or Ardougne cloak)
  • Fast travel to Brimhaven (Brimhaven teleport, Teleport to House if your house is in Brimhaven, sail from Ardougne or take a charter ship)
Enemies to defeat None

A recent addition to his private collection is a strange looking totem from Karamja. The Rantuki tribe are not happy about the recent disappearance of their totem.","difficulty":"Intermediate","kills":"None","name":"Tribal Totem","start":"Speak to [[Kangai Mau]] in [[Brimhaven]].","length":"Very Short","items":"None"}

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Kangai in the Shrimp and Parrot shop.

Talk to Kangai Mau in Brimhaven, in the Shrimp and Parrot food shop. Consider using the ship from Ardougne to Brimhaven (30 coins each way). Kangai wants help to recover a tribal totem that was stolen from the Rantuki Tribe by Lord Handelmort. Say "I'm in search of adventure!" and then "Ok, I will get it back" to start the quest.

  • Teleport or charter the Ship at the docks to Ardougne. Handelmort lives in the mansion (not the castle) west of the main square in Ardougne. Go to the house and find the door securely locked.
  • Talk to Horacio, the gardener, and ask him who he is. Ask him if he gardens around the back as well. You and Horacio will talk briefly about the security around the house. He will tell you that the combination to the door lock is Handelmort's middle name.

The only way to the totem is by using a new teleporting invention from Wizard Cromperty. Cromperty is in the house north-east of the Ardougne market. Ask him about his new invention. The new invention will teleport players next to a teleport block, which looks very similar to a crate. Ask Cromperty to teleport you, in order to find the location of this teleport block. This happens to be in the Ardougne GPDT depot. After the teleport, the teleport block is located in a crate to the east of the teleport location.

G.P.D.T.

Investigate the northeastern crate to find an address label, addressed to Lord Handelmort. Use this label on the eastern crate intended for the Chamber of Invention of the Wizards' Tower to cause the teleport block to be delivered to Lord Handelmort's house instead.

Talk to an GPDT employee, and ask when the block will be delivered. Obviously, that happens very quickly after talking to them. Return to Cromperty.

Talk to Cromperty and ask to use his new teleport spell again. (Do not use the right-click 'Teleport' option, or you will be sent to the Rune essence mine!) Now, the teleport is to the new location of the block in Lord Handelmort's house.

Inside the house, go west through two doors. The second door is locked; the password is K U R T. (Horatio, the gardener, will mention that it is Lord Handelmort's middle name. This can be found in the guide book from the real estate agent's house). Enter the code using the left and right arrows (K=10 right, U=6 left, R=9 left, T=7 left). When the password is set, click enter to unlock the door.

Enter the door and investigate the stairs. Do not use the "climb-up" option first! If you try to climb-up the stairs instead of investigating it first, a trap will activate when using the stairs. The trapdoor leads to the Ardougne Sewers.

  • If you fall down the trap, go south-west and climb up the ladder; then, let Cromperty teleport you back inside the house. You will not have to enter the door-code again.
  • If you investigate the stairs and a message appears (You don't find anything interesting.), it is because level 21 Thieving is required to progress through this part of the quest.
The chest that contains the Totem.

Climb up the stairs; you will avoid the trap. Go outside and enter the room east. Open the chest and search it to find the tribal totem. (You can use the drop technique to receive more.)

Go back to Brimhaven and return the totem to Kangai Mau, and complete the quest.

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • 1 Quest point
  • 1,775 Thieving experience
  • 5 Swordfish

Transcript[edit | edit source]

This article on a quest has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations encountered throughout the quest.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

Bug:
As of 13 February 2022, this quest's quest log entry still refers to GPDT employees as R.P.D.T. men and the depot as R.P.D.T. incorrectly after the 11 October 2018 update.

'''Tribal Totem''' is a quest that involves the retrieval of an artefact sacred to the [[Rantuki]] tribe of [[Karamja]], which has been taken from them by the nobleman [[Lord Handelmort]].

==Details==
{{Quest details
|start = Speak to [[Kangai Mau]] in [[Brimhaven]].
|difficulty = Intermediate
|description = Lord Handelmort of Ardougne is a collector of exotic artefacts. A recent addition to his private collection is a strange looking totem from Karamja. The Rantuki tribe are not happy about the recent disappearance of their totem.
|length = Very Short
|requirements = 
* {{SCP|Thieving|21|link=yes}} {{Boostable|yes}}
|items = None
|recommended = 
* Fast travel to [[Ardougne]] ([[Ardougne teleport]] or [[Ardougne cloak]])
* Fast travel to [[Brimhaven]] ([[Brimhaven teleport]], [[Teleport to House]] if your house is in Brimhaven, sail from Ardougne or take a [[charter ship]])
}}

==Walkthrough==
[[File:Tribal Totem - Kangai.png|thumb|220px|Kangai in the Shrimp and Parrot shop.]]
[[File:Kangai Mau chathead.png|left]]
Talk to [[Kangai Mau]] in [[Brimhaven]], in the [[the Shrimp and Parrot|Shrimp and Parrot]] food shop. Consider using the ship from [[Ardougne]] to Brimhaven (30 [[coins]] each way). Kangai wants help to recover a tribal totem that was stolen from the [[Rantuki Tribe]] by [[Lord Handelmort]]. Say ''"I'm in search of adventure!"'' and then ''"Ok, I will get it back"'' to start the quest.

* Teleport or charter the Ship at the docks to Ardougne. Handelmort lives in the mansion (not the castle) west of the main square in Ardougne. Go to the house and find the door securely locked.
* Talk to Horacio, the gardener, and ask him who he is. Ask him if he gardens around the back as well. You and Horacio will talk briefly about the security around the house. He will tell you that the combination to the door lock is Handelmort's middle name.

The only way to the totem is by using a new teleporting invention from [[Wizard Cromperty]]. Cromperty is in the house north-east of the [[Ardougne market]]. Ask him about his new invention. The new invention will teleport players next to a teleport block, which looks very similar to a crate. Ask Cromperty to teleport you, in order to find the location of this teleport block. This happens to be in the Ardougne [[Gielinor Parcel Delivery Team|GPDT depot]]. After the teleport, the teleport block is located in a crate to the east of the teleport location.
[[File:Tribal Totem - GPDT.png|thumb|220px|right|G.P.D.T.]]

Investigate the northeastern crate to find an [[address label]], addressed to Lord Handelmort. Use this label on the eastern crate intended for the Chamber of Invention of the [[Wizards' Tower]] to cause the teleport block to be delivered to Lord Handelmort's house instead.

Talk to an [[GPDT employee]], and ask when the block will be delivered. Obviously, that happens very quickly after talking to them. Return to Cromperty.

Talk to Cromperty and ask to use his new teleport spell again. '''(Do not use the right-click 'Teleport' option,''' or you will be sent to the [[Rune essence mine]]!''')''' Now, the teleport is to the new location of the block in Lord Handelmort's house.

Inside the house, go west through two doors. The second door is locked; the password is '''K U R T'''. (Horatio, the gardener, will mention that it is Lord Handelmort's middle name. This can be found in the guide book from the real estate agent's house). Enter the code using the left and right arrows (K=10 right, U=6 left, R=9 left, T=7 left). When the password is set, click enter to unlock the door.

Enter the door and '''investigate''' the stairs. '''''Do not'' use the "climb-up" option first! '''If you try to climb-up the stairs instead of investigating it first, a trap will activate when using the stairs. The trapdoor leads to the [[Ardougne Sewers]].
*If you fall down the trap, go south-west and climb up the ladder; then, let Cromperty teleport you back inside the house. You will not have to enter the door-code again.
*If you investigate the stairs and a message appears (''You don't find anything interesting.''), it is because level 21 [[Thieving]] is required to progress through this part of the quest.
[[File:Tribal Totem - Chest.png|thumb|220px|The chest that contains the Totem.]]

Climb up the stairs; you will avoid the trap. Go outside and enter the room east. Open the chest and search it to find the tribal totem. (You can use the [[Drop trick|drop technique]] to receive more.)

Go back to Brimhaven and return the [[totem]] to Kangai Mau, and complete the quest.{{Clear}}
